name: Martin Wirsing
content: Prof. Dr. Dr. h.c. Martin Wirsing, LMU Munich Prof. Dr. Dr. h.c. Martin Wirsing Full Professor (em.) Software and Computational Systems Lab Department of Computer Science Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München (LMU Munich) Oettingenstraße 67 80538 Munich (Germany) OfficeRoom F 011, Oettingenstr. 67 E-Mailwirsing (at) ifi.lmu.de Activities Projects Publications in DBLP in Google Scholar until 2015 Wikipedia Teaching Further Activities Research Software Development using Formal Methods Systematic Development of Adaptive Service-Oriented Systems Autonomous Self-Aware Systems Algebraic Specification Techniques Semantics of Specification and Programming Languages Software Engineering of Web and Hypermedia Applications My Festschrift Rocco De Nicola and Rolf Hennicker (eds.): Software, Services, and Systems. Essays Dedicated to Martin Wirsing on the Occasion of His Retirement from the Chair of Programming and Software Engineering Latest books Software Engineering for Collective Autonomic SystemsThe ASCENS Approach Java kompakt More selected books
